page.title: 08LIFE STYLES
page.content:
MRS PULLAN
On Thursday 23 May,we interviewed Mrs Pullan.When we got there we found out that it was closed,so we waited until 2:00pm.When she got back we went inside to interview her.She told us that she didn't have a main customer, but lots of regular customers.She was brought up in a shop in London but got bored of it and came to Landbeach to start up her own shop.Her main products are cigarettes and sweets.A Mr Wangler supplied her products twice a week.Her shop wasn't designed, she said it already had lots of shelves when she got there.The shop name came from her own,MC Pullan.Her shop was built over 200 years ago.She said it would make it much easier if there were more shops in Landbeach. (continued on page 9)
